**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 79 2.0, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 199 4.0 **Frequency** once per turn **Requirements** Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip spell. --- You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you're wielding. Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an extra 1d6 damage of a type depending on the school of the spell you just cast.
  • **[Abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2)** force damage
  • **[Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33) or [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)** the same type as the weapon
  • **[Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), or [Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92)** mental damage
  • **[Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)** a type the spell dealt, or force damage if the spell didn't deal damage
  • **[Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)** negative damage
